name: core_requirements

stories.note: Document the frontend requirements for Orket.

example_task: Create 'requirements.md' for the Orket Dashboard. MANDATORY LAYOUT: Top Left (50% width, 70% height) is a real-time File Browser with live editing view. Top Right (50% width, 70% height) is a Dynamic Member Display showing active Seats/Models with detail levels by role (Coders show files, Reviewers show docs). Bottom 30% split into 3 panels: 1. Raw Text Logs, 2. Computer Performance Graphs (CPU/RAM/VRAM), 3. Engine Telemetry Graphs.
